name: Earth From Another Sun 异宇星还 - Alpha
detailed_description:
Earth From Another Sun is a DBG - Rogue-like - FPS developed by Multiverse.
We are currently running the second Alpha test which is very different from our first playable build; therefore, we want to share with you a very basic rogue-like gameplay demo so that we can hear what you really think about the game and art style.

Story Background
In 2079, while people were enjoying the New Year’s Eve in family, a planet suddenly appeared out of a black hole and broke into Earth orbit. Same atmosphere and topology as The Earth, lots of familiar places were, only in a moment, put just in front of humanity eyes... The Joint Space Agency and The Universal Capital of the World's Most Famous Colony started fighting for the unknown planet resources. While fighting and exploring this new astronomical object, they found out that the environment was suitable for human beings, they discovered ruins of cities that are very similar to human architecture and... they also found a strange pathway that leads to anywhere in the galaxy cluster...

Gameplay：
- Deck building
- Awesome fights
- Exploration (coming soon)
